question: How do I find the training modules/courses on TrainPA?
text:
How do I find the training modules/courses on TrainPA?
          
        
There is no simple way to find the training modules on TrainPA once you have registered for a Pennie Training Group. The best way to get to the courses is to visit either 
New Broker Certification (pennie.com)
 or 
Broker Recertification (pennie.com)
 then follow the links in the turquoise section to be brought to each module directly.
The alternative is to search on TrainPA in the Course Catalog section. Once there, search for 
PA-Pennie:
 and scroll to find the courses you must complete. *
NOTE
 not all courses are available to Brokers, please ensure you are taking the correct course from Module 1 to Pennie: Exam.
